summary: During the Chinese Civil War of 1949, the Communists constantly harass the two priests of a remote Catholic mission outpost.
cast: William Holden|Clifton Webb|France Nuyen|Athene Seyler|Martin Benson|Edith Sharpe|Robert Lee|Marie Yang|Andy Ho|Burt Kwouk|Weaver Levy|Ronald Adam|Lin Chen|Anthony Chinn|Noel Hood|Ric Young
director: Directors: Leo McCarey, David W. Orton (uncredited)
